summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of Fractal V2.1 Dashboard completed successfully. All specified features tested and working properly with dark theme (zinc-950).

integration_issues.issue: 520 error during reset operation but functionality still works

passed_tests: Dark theme (zinc-950) loads correctly on /fractal page
Signal Card displays BTC symbol, HOLD signal, Confidence (1.2%), Expected Return (+10.7%)
Horizon Toggle (7d/14d/30d) buttons all functional and responsive
Forecast Chart renders with canvas element showing T+0, T+7, T+14, T+30 curve with cubic hermite interpolation
System Reliability section shows DEGRADED badge (47.1%) with component breakdown
Entropy Guard displays Consensus (1.7%) and Size Multiplier (15.0%)
Top Pattern Matches shows 3 historical matches with similarity scores
Why Not Trading section displays reasons: RELIABILITY DEGRADED, LOW CONFIDENCE, HIGH ENTROPY
Admin Controls: Drift Inject and Reset buttons both clickable and functional
Navigation between home page and fractal dashboard works smoothly
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor 520 error during reset operation - investigate server response but not critical as functionality works
